sentences.en: And if It'stops moving , subsidise it.
sentences.cn: 如果经济停滞不前, 就资助.

sentences.en: Germany has started to subsidise private pension saving.
sentences.cn: 德国开始补贴个人养老金储蓄.

sentences.en: How does ability let fabaceous beans do not have a relapse, fabaceous mark subsidise?
sentences.cn: 怎样才能让豆豆不复发, 豆痕消退?

sentences.en: If they try to subsidise their excess supply, in response to falling demand, retaliation seems certain.
sentences.cn: 如果他们想补贴过度供给, 以应对下降的需求, 那么报复就不可避免的了.

sentences.en: Now the questions are: why should northern European taxpayers be required to subsidise Greek voters given their failure to control their own government?
sentences.cn: 现在的问题是：希腊的选民未能看管好自己的政府，为什么要北欧国家的纳税人去资助他们？

sentences.en: Those with capital are unwilling to subsidise those without, at least not at prevailing prices.
sentences.cn: 拥有资金的机构又不愿意补贴缺乏资金的机构, 至少不愿以现行价格提供补贴.

words.tran_cn: 资助或补助（subsidize的过去时和过去分词）
资助；给与奖助金；向…行贿

trans.tran_cn: 给…津贴或补贴，资助或补助…
